titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Donald Bertrand Tresidder, President of Stanford University, Papers
Tresidder (Donald Bertrand), President of Stanford University, Papers
titlestmt.author: compiled by Stanford University Archives staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: Donald Bertrand Tresidder, president of Stanford University, papers
did.abstract: Office files of the President's Office during Tresidder's tenure as President, 1943-1948. Also included is some material from the earlier presidency of Dr. Ray Lyman Wilbur, who became Chancellor of the University in 1942.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

acqinfo.p: These records were received by the Stanford University Archives via administrative transfer from the Office of the President in 1968.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: Files in Series 7 are restricted until January 1, 2025. Otherwise the records are open for research; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [Identification of item,] Donald Bertrand Tresidder, President of Stanford University, Papers (SC0151). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: A Stanford graduate (A.B. 1919, M.D. 1927), Donald Tresidder was President of the Curry Company of Yosemite Park (1925-1948), a member of the Stanford Board of Trustees and its President (1939-1942), and fourth President of Stanford University (1943-1948).

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Office files of the President's Office during Tresidder's tenure as President, 1943-1948. Also included is material from the earlier presidency of Dr. Ray Lyman Wilbur, who became Chancellor of the University in 1942.

arrangement.head: Arrangement note
arrangement.p: The records are arranged in eight series: General Files; Departments; Military Programs; Funds; Scholarships and Fellowships; Disbanding of Sororities on Campus; Restricted Files; and Speeches.
